title: Inside Visma’s Mad Tour de France Scramble, Jorgenson’s Big GC Chance, Quinn’s Funky US jersey
content:
Tour de Hoody: Will they or won't they start? Visma-Lease a Bike is on egg shells if Jonas Vingegaard or Wout van Aert will be ready to race the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Inside Visma’s Mad Tour de France Scramble, Jorgenson’s Big GC Chance, Quinn’s Funky US jersey on Velo.
author: ahood
